channel.title: [667] ComponentRsPs - Deep wildy skilling - Pvm/pk/eco - weapon games - minigame
channel.description:
[size=24pt][size=14pt][color=pink]Component667[/color][/size][/size]
[b]Description[/b] Component RSPS is a runescape private server based on a 667 Eco/pk/pvm server. It is completely free to play and offers some of the most unique and highest quality gameplay in RuneScape private server history. We have been online since December 2015 and have shown no signs of slowing down. We offer high quality, bug-free minigames, all functional skills, loads of bosses, grand exchange, clue scrolls, veteran capes, loyalty system, dwarf cannons, and much more. Our community is constantly growing, and our staff team is always active and willing to help you through your adventure. We are always improving our servers, with frequent game and website updates coming from professional developers. - So, what are you waiting for...? Join hundreds of others - Become the best! [/ADMIN]
[b]Top Features[/b]
Frequent game and website updates Stable economy, player based grand exchange Over a dozen training grounds for quicker leveling Known for our PvM, with over 20 bosses and counting Flawless drop system (similar to runescape) with easy to manage drop tables Unique PvP aspects such as wilderness chests and several wilderness bosses Alot of minigames, including a flawless dueling system Allmost all skills fully functional Deep wildy skilling! Achievements: Completionists, Max, Full clan system Diffrents pk portals, such as: Pure pk, Multi pk (Safe) World events such as trivia, boss spawns and more slayer system with over 200 tasks Elite slayer system (boss slayer tasks) Over 75 clue scrolls implemented Master (120) capes, best models on the market Experiments All city's working All runescape lairs working Full banks with tabs, searching, inserting, swapping Awesome donor zone with several dozens extra features
[b] Server information [/b] Website: [url=http://www.componentrsps.tk]componentrsps.tk[/url] ( Domain getting registerd soon)
Client download: [URL=http://"https://www.dropbox.com/s/bmzcuadl06d1bri/ComponentRsPs.jar?dl=0"]https://www.dropbox.com/s/bmzcuadl06d1bri/ComponentRsPs.jar?dl=0[/URL][/ADMIN]
[b]Server media [/b] [url=https://www.upload.ee/image/5406535/1.png][img]https://www.upload.ee/thumb/5406535/1.png[/img][/url] [url=https://www.upload.ee/image/5406536/2.png][img]https://www.upload.ee/thumb/5406536/2.png[/img][/url] [url=https://www.upload.ee/image/5406537/3.png][img]https://www.upload.ee/thumb/5406537/3.png[/img][/url] [url=https://www.upload.ee/image/5406538/4.png][img]https://www.upload.ee/thumb/5406538/4.png[/img][/url] [url=https://www.upload.ee/image/5406540/5.png][img]https://www.upload.ee/thumb/5406540/5.png[/img][/url] [url=https://www.upload.ee/image/5406542/6.png][img]https://www.upload.ee/thumb/5406542/6.png[/img][/url] [url=https://www.upload.ee/image/5406543/7.png][img]https://www.upload.ee/thumb/5406543/7.png[/img][/url] [url=https://www.upload.ee/image/5406544/8.png][img]https://www.upload.ee/thumb/5406544/8.png[/img][/url] [url=https://www.upload.ee/image/5406545/9.png][img]https://www.upload.ee/thumb/5406545/9.png[/img][/url]

item.dc:creator: @iliaske iliaske
item.description:
@iliaske wrote:

[size=24pt][size=14pt][color=pink]Component667[/color][/size][/size]

Description
Component RSPS is a runescape private server based on a 667 Eco/pk/pvm server.
It is completely free to play and offers some of the most unique and highest quality gameplay in RuneScape private server history.
We have been online since December 2015 and have shown no signs of slowing down.
We offer high quality, bug-free minigames, all functional skills, loads of bosses, grand exchange, clue scrolls, veteran capes, loyalty system, dwarf cannons, and much more.
Our community is constantly growing, and our staff team is always active and willing to help you through your adventure.
We are always improving our servers, with frequent game and website updates coming from professional developers.

  • So, what are you waiting for…? Join hundreds of others - Become the best! [/ADMIN]

Top Features

Frequent game and website updates
Stable economy, player based grand exchange
Over a dozen training grounds for quicker leveling
Known for our PvM, with over 20 bosses and counting
Flawless drop system (similar to runescape) with easy to manage drop tables
Unique PvP aspects such as wilderness chests and several wilderness bosses
Alot of minigames, including a flawless dueling system
Allmost all skills fully functional
Deep wildy skilling!
Achievements: Completionists, Max, 
Full clan system
Diffrents pk portals, such as: Pure pk, Multi pk (Safe)
World events such as trivia, boss spawns and more
slayer system with over 200 tasks
Elite slayer system (boss slayer tasks)
Over 75 clue scrolls implemented
Master (120) capes, best models on the market
Experiments
All city's working
All runescape lairs working
Full banks with tabs, searching, inserting, swapping
Awesome donor zone with several dozens extra features

Server information
Website: componentrsps.tk ( Domain getting registerd soon)

Client download: [URL=http://“https://www.dropbox.com/s/bmzcuadl06d1bri/ComponentRsPs.jar?dl=0”]https://www.dropbox.com/s/bmzcuadl06d1bri/ComponentRsPs.jar?dl=0[/URL][/ADMIN]
